'''Strange Saurian Cart Key''' is a [[Quest Item]]. It is used on the locked door of the nearby ''Saurian Cart'', that is defended by several [[Treasure Hoarders]]. Once the door has been unlocked, the player can access a [[Pyroculus]]. Feeding a [[Sunsettia]] to the [[Tepetlisaur Whelp]] inside will cause it to leave the cart. Following the ''Tepetlisaurus'' will lead to an [[Chest|Exquisite Chest]], although the player will need to defeat several more ''Treasure Hoarders'' along the way.
